short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically aggregates and copies links within a Medium or Blogger blog post.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can aggregate all links in a blog post so the user doesn't have to make their own list or try to go back and forth copying and pasting links between the post and a third party note taking app.

Simply click the icon and all links are copied and formatted consistently. Links are not repeated. When you're ready, paste the links wherever you see fit in your post. If you add a link late in the game, you can just click it again to generate a new list.

Current platform support:
- Medium
- Blogger
- Tumblr

Please report bugs and other issues on GitHub.
